00041         private void bankAccountsListBox_SelectedIndexChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
00042         {
00043             if (this.bankAccountsListBox.SelectedItem != null)
00044             {
00045                 this.tabControl1.SelectTab(BANKACCOUNTTAB);
00046                 this.SwitchBankAccountControls(true);
00047             }
00048             else
00049             {
00050                 this.SwitchBankAccountControls(false);
00051             }
00052         }

00181         public int CurrentStock
00182         {
00183             get
00184             {
00185                 int currentStock;
00186                 try
00187                 {
00188                     currentStock = int.Parse(currStockTextBox.Text);
00189                     return currentStock;
00190                 }
00191                 catch (FormatException e)
00192                 {
00193                     this.DisplayError(currStockTextBox);
00194                     throw;
00195                 }
00196             }
00197         }

00399         {

00404         private void DisplayError(Control form)
00405         {
00406             backgroundColorChanged.Add(form);
00407             form.BackColor = Color.MistyRose;
00408         }

00410         private void LoadFilePathSettings()
00411         {
00412             Settings settings = Settings.Default;
00413 
00414             String filePathStockItems = settings.StockItemFilePath;
00415             String filePathBankAccounts = settings.BankAccountFilePath;
00416             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(filePathStockItems))
00417             {
00418                 this._Presenter.SetUpStockItemFilePath(filePathStockItems);
00419             }
00420             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(filePathBankAccounts))
00421             {
00422                 this._Presenter.SetUpBankAccountsFilePath(filePathBankAccounts);
00423             }
00424         }
00425 
00426         private void SetUpDataBindings()
00427         {
00428             stockItemsListBox.DataSource = _Model.StockItems;
00429             stockItemsListBox.DisplayMember = "Name";
00430 
00431             /*
00432              * The datasourceupdatemode is set to "Never".
00433              * This leads to the ability to enforce the use of the presenter to update the values in the model.
00434              * This way the validation errors can be handled by the presenter thus leading to better seperation of concerns.
00435              */
00436             stockCodeTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.StockItems, "StockCode", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00437             itemNameTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.StockItems, "Name", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00438             supplierNameTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.StockItems, "SupplierName", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00439             currStockTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.StockItems, "CurrentStock", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00440             reqStockTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.StockItems, "RequiredStock", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00441             priceTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.StockItems, "UnitCost", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00442 
00443             bankAccountsListBox.DataSource = _Model.BankAccounts;
00444             bankAccountsListBox.DisplayMember = "AccountNumber";
00445 
00446             accountNumberTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.BankAccounts, "AccountNumber", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00447             nameTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.BankAccounts, "Surname", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00448             balanceTextBox.DataBindings.Add("Text", _Model.BankAccounts, "Balance", false, DataSourceUpdateMode.Never);
00449         }
00450 
00451         private void quantityTextBox_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
00452         {
00453             String newText = quantityTextBox.Text;
00454             int parseInt = 0;
00455             if (int.TryParse(newText, out parseInt))
00456             {
00457                 placeOrderButton.Enabled = true;
00458             }
00459             else
00460             {
00461                 placeOrderButton.Enabled = false;
00462             }
00463         }
